dct_alternative_sm: Nouam hanc et accuratissimam Territorii Vicentini descriptionem
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on Bononiense given in "Scala milliarium Italicorum"; 15 units [= 7 cm].
Bar scale on Vicentini given in "Scala de Miglia".
Bononiense on left, Vicentini on right.
Index on Vicentini: "Cose piu notabili della citta".
Inset map on Vicentini: "Pianta della nobilis & citta di Vincenza.
Appears in Ortelius' Theatro del Mondo, 1608, Latin edition of Ortelius' Theatrum orbis terrarum, published by Vrients after Ortelius' death.
